meanings.sent1: There were a zillion stars in the sky.
meanings.sent2: She had a zillion toys in her room.
meanings.sent3: I have a zillion things to do today!
meanings.sent4: The possibilities are as vast as a zillion grains of sand.
meanings.sent5: The zillion balloons filled the room with color.

meanings.sent1: He ate a zillion cookies at the party.
meanings.sent2: There were a zillion people at the concert.
meanings.sent3: I have a zillion reasons to smile.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed like a zillion bells.
meanings.sent5: The zillion raindrops created a soothing sound on the roof.
